description:
The Aeon team has announced the release of Aeon Desktop Release Candidate 3 (RC3), the first version with Full Disk Encryption by default.

The post OpenSUSE’s Aeon Desktop Release Candidate 3 (RC3) is Released With Full Disk Encryption appeared first on Linux Today.
title: OpenSUSE’s Aeon Desktop Release Candidate 3 (RC3) is Released With Full Disk Encryption

description:
The latest fwupd 1.9.22 firmware update daemon addresses multiple bugs and adds support for Framework SD and Raspberry Pi 5.

The post Fwupd 1.9.22 Brings Unofficial Raspberry Pi 5 Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Fwupd 1.9.22 Brings Unofficial Raspberry Pi 5 Support
